item.title: 职位描述— 寻找更好的数字，否则就会被淘汰
item.description:
向信使开枪进一步威胁到美国在世界经济中的中心地位。【原文：

Shooting the messenger further threatens US centrality to the world economy.

】

item.title: 三菱以 2.05 亿美元增持泰国联合公司股份
item.description: 三菱商事株式会社正在寻求以 66.5 亿泰铢（约合 2.05 亿美元）的价格收购 Thai Union Pcl 13.81% 的股份，这家日本企业集团的目标是深化与泰国海产品生产商的合作。【原文：Mitsubishi Corp. is seeking to acquire an additional 13.81% stake in Thai Union Pcl for 6.65 billion baht ($205 million) as the Japanese conglomerate aims to deepen collaboration with the Thai seafood producer.】

item.title: 就业数据刺激美元走软，新兴货币反弹
item.description: 在美国就业数据弱于预期，促使交易员对美联储降息作出定价，从而推动美元走低之后，新兴市场货币反弹。【原文：Emerging-market currencies rallied after weaker-than-expected US jobs data prompted traders to price in Federal Reserve rate cuts, driving the dollar lower.】

item.title: 中国对债券利息收入免税数十年后将征税
item.description: 中国表示，计划对政府和金融机构发行的债券的利息收入征税，这一出人意料的举动促使投资者重新评估其债市头寸。【原文：China said it plans to tax interest income on bonds issued by the government and financial institutions, in a surprise move that’s prompted investors to reevaluate their debt market positions.】

item.title: 关税影响情绪，印度股市情绪趋于谨慎
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 野村起薪与日本竞争对手持平以留住员工
item.description: 日本的中型券商正在追随国内最大的券商，提高应届毕业生的起薪，因为在就业市场紧张的情况下，这些券商正在努力增加人手。【原文：Mid-sized brokerages in Japan are following the biggest domestic firms in raising their starting salaries for new graduates, as they struggle with staffing in a tight job market.】

item.title: 投资者增税计划在韩国面临越来越多的反对意见
item.description: 在韩国，一项提高资本利得税的计划正面临越来越多的反对意见，该计划上周五导致韩国股价突然暴跌。基准股票指数 Kospi 周一上涨。【原文：A plan to hike the capital gains tax is facing growing opposition in South Korea, where the proposal caused a sudden slump in stock prices on Friday. The benchmark equity index Kospi rose on Monday.】

item.title: 日本收益率下滑，10 年期债券拍卖需求存疑
item.description: 周一上午，在美国就业报告弱于预期之后，日本国债收益率下跌，引发了对周二 10 年期国债销售需求的担忧。【原文：Japan’s government bond yields fell on Monday morning following a weaker-than-expected US employment report, raising concerns about demand at a 10-year debt sale on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普关税冲击有望加深卢比的不佳表现
item.description: 分析师说，印度卢比下半年仍将是亚洲表现最差的货币之一，美国关税给本已脆弱的经济复苏增加了压力。【原文：India’s rupee is poised to remain one of Asia’s worst performers in the second half of the year, with US tariffs adding pressure to an already fragile economic recovery, analysts say.】

item.title: 马来西亚棕榈油库存将飙升至 19 个月新高
item.description: 彭博社的一项调查显示，马来西亚的棕榈油库存攀升至2023年12月以来的最高水平，因为这个世界第二大棕榈油种植国的产量出现反弹。【原文：Palm oil inventories in Malaysia climbed to the highest level since December 2023 as production in the world’s second-biggest grower rebounded, according to a Bloomberg survey.】

item.title: 美国就业数据疲软、关税出台后黄金保持涨势
item.description: 黄金在上周五创下两个月来最大涨幅后持稳，因为交易员们在权衡疲软的就业数据对美国经济和美联储加息路径的影响。【原文：Gold was steady after gaining the most in two months on Friday, as traders weighed the implications of soft jobs data for the US economy and the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate path.】

item.title: 日本首相称与美国的双赢贸易协议可能难以实施
item.description: 日本首相石破茂表示，美国和日本上个月达成的贸易协议对两国来说是 "双赢 "的，但执行协议条款可能是比达成协议更大的挑战。【原文：The trade deal reached last month between the US and Japan was “win-win” for both countries, but implementing the terms of the pact may be a bigger challenge than reaching the deal, Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba said.】

item.title: 联合利华印度公司新任首席执行官必须重振疲软的消费巨头
item.description: 印度斯坦联合利华有限公司（Hindustan Unilever Ltd.）新任首席执行官普里亚-奈尔（Priya Nair）将接手这家印度最大的消费品生产商。【原文：Hindustan Unilever Ltd.’s new Chief Executive Officer Priya Nair is inheriting India’s largest consumer goods maker that has seen stuttering growth in the last few years.】

item.title: 矿石短缺，中国或需削减创纪录的铜产量
item.description: 中国的铜冶炼厂可能正处于一个转折点，因为矿石的持续短缺迫使它们将产量从创纪录的水平上削减下来；而此时，中国政府正在加紧打击各行业的产能过剩。【原文：China’s copper smelters could be at a turning point, as a persistent shortage of ore forces them to trim production from record levels — just as the government ramps up its campaign against overcapacity across industries.】

item.title: 博思格竞购怀阿拉钢铁厂，引领绿色钢铁发展潮流
item.description: 博思格钢铁有限公司（BlueScope Steel Ltd.）表示，该公司将领导一个国际财团竞购南澳大利亚州陷入困境的怀阿拉钢铁厂，调查将该厂改造成低碳钢铁生产中心的可能性。【原文：BlueScope Steel Ltd. said it will lead an international consortium to bid for the beleaguered Whyalla steelworks in South Australia, investigating the possibility of converting the site into a low-carbon steel manufacturing hub.】

item.title: 退出重组后泰国航空股票将恢复交易
item.description: 泰国国际航空公司（Thai Airways International Pcl）的股票将于周一在曼谷恢复交易，这是五年来的第一次，也是这家国有控股航空公司摆脱 120 亿美元债务重组的高潮。【原文：Shares of Thai Airways International Pcl will resume trading Monday in Bangkok for the first time in five years, the culmination of the state-controlled airline’s emergence from its $12 billion debt restructuring.】

item.title: 简街印度交易显示套利与市场操纵之间界限模糊
item.description: 这是恶劣的市场操纵还是合法的交易策略？【原文：Was it egregious market manipulation or a legitimate trading strategy?】

item.title: 市场综述：交易员削减风险，亚洲股市将下跌
item.description: 在疲软的美国就业数据拖累华尔街走低并助长了对美联储下月降息的押注、导致国债飙升之后，亚洲股市周一有望下滑。由于欧佩克+组织（OPEC+）结束了连续的大幅增产，石油价格回落。【原文：Asian stocks are poised to slip Monday after soft US jobs data dragged Wall Street lower and fueled bets on a Fed rate cut next month, sending Treasuries surging. Oil retreated as OPEC+ wrapped up a run of major output hikes.】

item.title: 美国数据引发增长担忧，日本股市将下跌
item.description: 在最新的美国就业数据引发对世界最大经济体的担忧之后，日本股市周一将下跌。由于市场猜测美联储将降息，日元兑美元汇率反弹，出口商可能将面临压力。【原文：Japanese stocks are poised to drop on Monday after the latest US jobs data raised concern over the world’s largest economy. Exporters will likely come under pressure after the yen rallied against the dollar on speculation the Federal Reserve will cut rates.】

item.title: 欧佩克+供应增加加剧对供应过剩的担忧后石油下跌
item.description: 在欧佩克+同意再次大幅增产后，石油价格下跌，加剧了人们对全球供应过剩的担忧，而美国主导的贸易战可能会对经济增长和能源消耗造成影响。【原文：Oil fell after OPEC+ agreed to another bumper output increase, stoking concerns about global oversupply just as the US-led trade war may be exacting a toll on economic growth and energy consumption.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称安费诺即将达成收购 CommScope 宽带部门的交易
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日援引知情人士的话报道，安费诺公司即将收购 CommScope Holding 的宽带连接部门，包括债务在内的交易价值约为 105 亿美元。【原文：Amphenol Corp. is nearing an acquisition of CommScope Holding’s broadband connectivity arm in a deal valued at roughly $10.5 billion including debt, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普的利率障碍比鲍威尔更大
item.description:
利率上升的原因远不止美联储的决定。债务、人口结构和去全球化都在推动货币价格上涨。【原文：

Higher rates are the result of far more than Fed decisions. Debt, demographics, and deglobalization are all driving the price of money up.

】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 印度正在经受来自俄罗斯的石油流量的考验，而中国的煤炭正在大量增加。世界主要供应国的小麦出口滞后。此外，在全球需求上升之际，美国赢得了一些铜减免。【原文：India is being put to the test over its oil flows from Russia, while coal is proliferating in China. Wheat exports are lagging from the world’s top suppliers. And, the US won some copper relief at a time when global demand is on the rise.】

item.title: 加纳要求 MultiChoice 削减订阅费用，图文报道
item.description: 据《每日图片报》报道，加纳已要求多选择集团（MultiChoice Group）的本地部门在 8 月 7 日前将订阅费降低 30%，否则将面临被吊销广播许可证的风险。【原文：Ghana has asked the local unit of MultiChoice Group to reduce subscription fees by 30% by Aug. 7 or risk suspension of its broadcasting license, Daily Graphic reported.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"结束动荡篇章，给交易商留下悬念
item.description: 周日，欧佩克+组织（OPEC+）结束了其石油战略中长达两年的篇章，进行了一系列丰产中的最后一次增产。但这给原油交易商留下了一个悬念。【原文：OPEC+ closed a two-year chapter in its oil strategy on Sunday with the last in a series of bumper oil production increases. But it left crude traders with a cliffhanger.】

item.title: 巴西总统卢拉表示，如果被平等对待，他对美国贸易谈判持开放态度
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）表示，巴西对与唐纳德-特朗普的贸易谈判持开放态度，但前提是巴西必须获得与美国平等的待遇，并重申他不会屈服于美国总统的政治压力。【原文：President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said Brazil is open to trade talks with Donald Trump but only if his country is treated as an equal to the US, reiterating that he won’t bow to political pressure from the US president.】

item.title: 加拿大贸易特使仍认为有机会缓解特朗普的关税政策
item.description: 一位加拿大官员表示，在两国政府未能在8月1日关税截止日期前达成协议后，加拿大总理马克-卡尼和美国总统唐纳德-特朗普预计将在 "未来几天 "进行会谈。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney and US President Donald Trump are expected to talk “over the next number of days,” a Canadian official said, after the two governments failed to reach a deal before an Aug. 1 tariff deadline.】

item.title: 债券市场的痛苦交易转为就业冲击带来的回报
item.description: 就在债券投资者怀疑自己最喜欢的策略之一时，它又卷土重来了。【原文：Just when bond investors were doubting one of their favorite strategies, it’s making a comeback.】

item.title: 特朗普前就业数据主管谴责解雇继任者
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统解雇首席劳工统计学家的做法遭到了她的前任的批评，他称此举毫无根据，会破坏人们对美国经济一组关键数据的信心。【原文：President Donald Trump’s firing of the chief labor statistician was criticized by her predecessor, who called it an unfounded move that will undermine confidence in a key data set on the US economy.】

item.title: 新兴市场大事记：基金重整游戏规则（播客）
item.description: 新加坡的 Marcus Wong 与 Malavika Kaur Makol 一起讨论了在美元于 7 月份反弹的情况下，一些新兴市场投资者如何重新制定他们的投资策略。一些战术性交易包括新兴市场美元债券与本币债务的对比，因为投资者正在重新调整他们对美元的近期看法。【原文：Marcus Wong in Singapore joins Malavika Kaur Makol to discuss how some emerging-market investors are reworking their playbooks given the dollar’s bounceback in July. Some tactical trades include emerging-market dollar bonds versus local currency debt as investors recalibrate their near-term dollar views.】
